name: Nukalypse: The Final War
detailed_description:
"Nukalypse: The Final War" is set in the USSR somewhere in the 80s after the nuclear disaster of Chernobyl. The player finds themselves alone in a facility full of enemies that have occupied the area, aswell as horribly mutated animals that they will have to overcome in order to survive.
The game features full 3D models, in a creepy style. The gameplay is quick and action-packed, combined with parkour, weaponry and no shortage of enemies to kill.
